text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Keep inciting your supporters To liberate and to protest cause they aren’t wearing masks and don’t care if they contract or die from the COVID19. All that means is less Trump voters in November... go ahead.. protest all you want. In fact start holding huge rallies again.
